mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.plan_to_start AS "planToStart", a.plan_to_end AS "planToEnd", a.subpackage_programnum AS "subpackageProgramNum", a.subpackage_programname AS "subpackageProgramName", a.subpackage_programcont AS "subpackageProgramCont", a.tender_company AS "tenderCompany", a.sub_program_type AS "subProgramType", a.parent_id AS "program.id", p.programname AS "program.programName", p.programtype AS "program.programType", o.name AS "program.office.name", a.status AS "status"
LEFT JOIN ccpt.program_tab AS p on p.id=a.parent_id LEFT JOIN ccpt.sys_office AS o on o.id = p.sys_officeid
mapper.select: SELECT a.sub_program_type AS "subProgramType" FROM subpackage_program a where a.parent_id = #{program.id}
SELECT a.subpackage_programnum AS "subpackageProgramNum" FROM subpackage_program a WHERE a.create_date = (SELECT MAX(a.create_date) FROM subpackage_program a)

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.subpackage_programname AS "subpackageProgramName" FROM subpackage_program a
AND a.subpackage_programname LIKE concat('%',#{subpackageProgramName},'%')

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.subpackage_programname AS "subpackageProgramName" FROM subpackage_program a LEFT JOIN ccpt.subbid_company s ON s.subpackage_program_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ccpt.clearevaluate_bid c ON c.subbid_company_id = s.id LEFT JOIN ccpt.program_contract pc ON pc.program_id = a.parent_id
AND a.subpackage_programname LIKE concat('%',#{subpackageProgramName},'%')
AND c.isBid=1 AND pc.approval_status = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subpackage_program( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, plan_to_start, plan_to_end, subpackage_programnum, subpackage_programname, subpackage_programcont, parent_id, tender_company, sub_program_type, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{planToStart}, #{planToEnd}, #{subpackageProgramNum}, #{subpackageProgramName}, #{subpackageProgramCont}, #{program.id}, #{tenderCompany}, #{subProgramType}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE subpackage_program SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, plan_to_start = #{planToStart}, plan_to_end = #{planToEnd}, subpackage_programnum = #{subpackageProgramNum}, subpackage_programname = #{subpackageProgramName}, subpackage_programcont = #{subpackageProgramCont}, parent_id = #{program.id}, sub_program_type = #{subProgramType}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
